creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
dimension:
7 1/4 × 3 3/4 in. (18.42 × 9.53 cm)
10 × 5 15/16 in. (25.4 × 15.08 cm) (mount, paper mount)
10 1/2 × 7 in. (26.67 × 17.78 cm) (mount, cardboard frame/mount)
markings: on back of paper mount, R edge, in pencil: [Baiitsu 1783-1856]; and on back of paperboard mount, R edge, in ink: [Addiss]
title: Crane Design for Sword-Guard
